title: The Adventures of Ling King: Director of Virtues

story.text: Ling King spends his days tutoring underprivileged kids. There's a buzz in the air as they unveil a statue in the city center, dedicated to an unknown hero who's been saving people from various mishaps.

During a directing session at the local theater, Ling overhears actors discussing recent mysterious rescues. One mentions the hero's peculiar symbol resembling a director’s clapboard, which piques Ling’s interest.

While tutoring, Ling helps a student with a science project about leverage, which gives him an idea to use mechanical devices to help in difficult rescues discreetly. His double life becomes a perfect blend of his hobbies and hero duties.
Ling installs small, powerful pulleys and levers around key areas in town. That night, he discreetly uses them to rescue a cat stuck atop a high tree, unknowingly observed by an elderly admirer.
Rumors spread about a 'Phantom Fixer'—a hero who silently averts disasters and mishaps. Ling, smiling, hears his students theorizing about the hero's true identity, never suspecting him.

During the community theater premiere, a set malfunction threatens to ruin the show. Ling discreetly uses his devices to salvage the set, earning a standing ovation for what audience members think was part of the act.

At dawn, Ling quietly adds another device near the newly unveiled statue. That afternoon, as the statue begins to tilt dangerously during a ceremony, it mysteriously 'rights' itself, to the crowd’s awe and applause.

ending: Later that night, Ling King stands beside the statue, a quiet smile on his face as he watches the city he protects sparkle under the starry sky.
